name: Glitterato Photoshop Plugin
summary: A Q9R file is a Glitterato plugin developed by Flaming Pear Software for use in Adobe Photoshop to add special visual effects. It contains compiled code that runs within Photoshop to generate star fields, nebulae, and other space-themed imagery. Designers and digital artists use the Glitterato Q9R plugin to create realistic cosmic scenes without manually drawing them.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
